sentences.en: a meeting of the village elders
He had always been overshadowed by his elder sister.
sentences.cn: 他与他姐姐相比总是相形见绌。

sentences.en: He is my elder by five years.
He is now an elder of the village church.
sentences.cn: 他现在是乡村教会的长老。

sentences.en: His elder brother is a sergeant.
His elder sister had been his guide, counsellor and friend.
sentences.cn: 他姐姐过去一直指导他, 给他出主意,是他的朋友.

sentences.en: James has outgrown his elder brother.
sentences.cn: 詹姆士长得比他哥哥高.

sentences.en: Sarah is the elder of the two.
sentences.cn: 两人当中萨拉年纪较长。

sentences.en: She made liberal use of her elder sister's make-up and clothes.
sentences.cn: 她随便把姐姐的化妆品和衣服拿来用。

sentences.en: She shouldn't entreat her elder like that.
She used to play games of make-believe with her elder sister.
sentences.cn: 她过去常跟姐姐玩扮家家的游戏。

sentences.en: So it was Xiao Wang's elder sister who called just now.
sentences.cn: 刚才打电话的敢情是小王的姐姐呀!

sentences.en: the elder of their two sons
sentences.cn: 他们的两个儿子中年纪大的那个

sentences.en: The elder son is the cook of the walk.
The person you saw yesterday was not her, but her elder sister.
sentences.cn: 昨天你看见的不是她, (而)是她姐姐.

words.tran_cn: 上了年纪的；过了中年的；稍老的
年长的；年龄较大的；资格老的

trans.tran_en: the elder of two people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first

trans.tran_cn: 年长者，有威望的长者，长老，接骨木
trans.tran_en: to be older than someone else
